Womens Down Jackets - Advantages of Women's Down Jackets


When shopping for a new north face jacket, one age-old option has recently come back into style – women’s down jackets. While women’s down jackets have not been so popular in the past few years, they are quickly becoming the new winter trend. The trend started in the bedroom. People began to rediscover the benefits of down comforters, duvets, and pillows. Once they found out that they slept better than ever before with no ill effects, their thoughts turned to the once-popular down-filled jackets and coats of yore.

The advantages of women’s down jackets are plentiful and big enough to sway people back from what was recently considered a taboo material. Here are some of the benefits of north face jacket for womens:

Down is a natural material that has properties that cannot be reproduced by man-made materials. Down are fluffy feathers without the spines that come from ducks and geese. Down is what keeps ducks, geese, and other birds from the numbing cold at the high altitudes in which they must fly. Although the material is much more expensive than man-made fillers, if you spend the extra money it takes to buy a women’s down jacket, you will discover that nothing is better at insulating you from the cold than down. Not only does north face jacket store insulate you from the cold, it actually absorbs the heat from your body, forming a protective layer inside the coat that can actually have you sweating if it is not sufficiently cold outside.

find a good north face jacket site



This jacket is well worth the price. It is extremely warm and durable. I bought the black jacket because I think it can be worn both casually and with more professional attire if need be.

the north face jacket for men's


I purchased this cheap north face jacket for a X-mas gift for my husband. Because he's hard to shop for. I had him try it on to make sure if fits. Well... needless to say, I didn't have to do any wrapping for this gift. HE loves the jacket. He raves about how warm it is and he loves that he has multiple north face jackets combined into one. Well... living in Chicago and it's winter time he's had a chance to wear it many different ways. It's only been cold a few days - but we all know (Chicago can be 60 on your way to work and be 30 on your way home) the cold weather will be here soon. I (he) highly recommends this north face jacket !

cheap north face jacket


Thanks for such a detailed review! It's really helpful to customers when you share approximate measurements and what size you got- like you did. We're glad you're happy with your purchase and are positive that you will get many years of use out of the Vortex.
